greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A variant of A322827.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16383
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
program: (PARI) A322825(n) = if(!n,1, my(rl=1, m=1, p=2, eb = (n%2)); n>>=1; while(n,if((n%2)==eb, rl++, eb = 1-eb; m *= p^rl; p = nextprime(1+p)); n >>= 1); m *= p^rl; (m));

(PARI) A322825(n) = if(!n,1,my(bits = Vecrev(binary(n)), rl=1, o = List([])); for(i=2,#bits,if(bits[i]==bits[i-1], rl++, listput(o,rl))); listput(o,rl); my(es=Vec(o), m=1); for(i=1,#es,m *= prime(i)^es[i]); (m));
xref: Cf. A005811, A227183, A322827 (the main entry).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 16 2019
